thread.title: What time does Manchester City vs Roma start, is Raheem Sterling playing and what TV channel is it on?
thread.title_full: What time does Manchester City vs Roma start, is Raheem Sterling playing and what TV channel is it on? - Telegraph

author: Telegraph Sport
title: What time does Manchester City vs Roma start, is Raheem Sterling playing and what TV channel is it on?
text: What time does the match start and how do I watch it? The game kicks off at 11am in the United Kingdom and at 8pm Australian time. What competition is this match part of? It is part of the Australian arm of the International Champions Cup, in which City will also meet Real Madrid. Raheem Sterling has been added to City's squad in order to increase the number of homegrown players Will Raheem Sterling play? With Raheem Sterling's protracted Â£49 million transfer from Liverpool out of the way, Manchester City fans have been keenly anticipating his debut for Manuel Pellegrini's side. The Chilean manager suggested that Sterling is likely to make his debut during the match in Melbourne, and in fact, is almost certain to at least play some minutes. Raheem Sterling taking photographs with fans earlier in the tour Discussing Sterling and other international City stars, Pellegrini said: "They arrived late, because they were with internationals, just worked five days with us, but I think most will be involved, maybe not the whole game but some minutes. "I think Raheem worked with Liverpool for three days and so he will play some minutes. "I know him [Sterling]. I've seen him play against us for the last two seasons, but I think it's important for him to try and have minutes with our team as soon as he can." Where is the match being held? The clash is being held at Melbourne Cricket Ground in Victoria. What television channel is it on? Sterling has proven a big hit with City fans since signing The match will be broadcast live on Sky Sports 1 in the UK. Coverage begins at 10.45am. Follow @telefootball
